 Are you able to hear those few files I sent to the list?

 



-----Origin=
al Message-----
From: Rj <rasterer@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups=
.com
Sent: Tue, Jul 27, 2010 10:54 am
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: depressing=
,

          =C2=A0                                  
If there is a chance =
you might be able to stop this Morgan person from hurting another child, yo=
u must call now.=C2=A0=C2=A0 Waiting so that you don't look wrong or silly =
is not the priority here: there are more important things on the line than =
personal ego (I hope).



--- On Tue, 7/27/10, SnowfireL@... <Snowfi=
reL@...> wrote:

From: SnowfireL@... <SnowfireL@...>
S=
ubject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: depressing,
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tue=
sday, July 27, 2010, 7:38 AM

      =C2=A0                              
 N=
o, and no, this is a younger child, recently missing, I have not called yet=
, I want to see if anyone can hear what I am hearing yet before I let them =
know.=C2=A0 I got names, and the little guy, I think said "hi" to me.=C2=A0=
 At this point no one else is able to hear my files, so I won't do a thing =
until i get validation from the so-called living first. sf
 
   
 
  
 
 --=

ortant things on the line than personal ego (I hope).<br>
